title: Montana Surprise
description: Gino Terranova hopes for a future with Carrie Sheehan—but when she springs surprises on him, can he forgive her so they can be happy together? Carrie must regain Gino’s trust—can she do it or is all hope lost? Echo Canyon Brides series reading  Book 1: Montana Rescue Book 2: Montana Bargain Book 3: Montana Adventure Book 4: Montana Luck Book 5: Montana Fire Book 6: Montana Hearts Book 7: Montana Christmas Book 8: Montana Orphan Book 9: Montana Surprise Book 10: Montana Miracle Book 11: Montana Ricochet.
author: Linda Bridey
